Label: Post Mortem Interval
Lookup/Notes:
Takes decimal values (7,2) two decimal places

For Unknown please set to 9999.99
Not Applicable please set to 8888.88

PMI should be measured in hours.
Notes: (hrs Ð precise (witnessed) vs. last known alive)

Label: RIN
Lookup/Notes:
If Unknown or Not Assessed then code 99.99
If known then - decimal values (4,2) two decimal places
Notes: Either RIN or RINe needs to be coded for a subject.  Both cannot be coded for the same subject.  Whichever field you do not code, please leave it blank.

Label: RINe
Lookup/Notes:
If Unknown or Not Assessed then code 99.99
If known then - decimal values (4,2) two decimal places
Notes: Either RIN or RINe needs to be coded for a subject.  Both cannot be coded for the same subject.  Whichever field you do not code, please leave it blank.

Label: pH
Lookup/Notes:
If Unknown or Not Assessed then code 99.99
If known then - decimal values (4,2) two decimal places

Label: Brain Weight Measurement
Lookup/Notes:
For unknown, please code 9999
Measurement should be in grams.

Label: Antemortem MRI (Y/N)
Notes: if yes then: research vs. clinical, number, dates

Label: Postmortem MRI Type
Lookup/Notes: 0 - cadaveric; 1 - fresh ex vivo; 2 - fixed ex vivo

Label: Anatomical atlas registration (Y/N)
Notes: if yes then details - atlas reference?
